fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Immediately attack a player during the day.
- Attempt to turn a player to your cause.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you turn a player to your cause, they will be given a prompt: Join the Anarchists, or remain with their faction. Conversion immune roles will not be given this prompt.
- If they decline, nothing happens. If they accept, they gain a 1-time use of your day attack and may also turn people to your cause, albeit with a 1 night cooldown. They gain your goal and you may win with them, and they win with each other. You do not know if your target accepts or declines.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Recruit those to assist you in sending this town into anarchy.
